result.eng: I don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.
result.ga: Ní maith liom a chuid cainte
result.orig: Ní maith liom a chuid cainte
result.html: Ní maith liom a chuid cainteI don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.
result.ponchtml: Ní maiṫ liom a ċuid cainteI don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.

result.eng: I'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ga: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.orig: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.html: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ponchtml: Laḃróiḋ mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.

result.eng: Do not talk to the other person.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.html: Ná labhair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.

result.eng: Can I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ga: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.orig: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.html: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ponchtml: An féidir liom laḃairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.

result.eng: Too much talk!
result.ga: An iomarca cainte
result.orig: An iomarca cainte
result.html: An iomarca cainteToo much talk!
result.ponchtml: An iomarca cainteToo much talk!

result.eng: You will have to talk to her again.
result.ga: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.orig: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.html: Beidh ort labhairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort laḃairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.

result.eng: His talk was a little obscure.
result.ga: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.orig: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.html: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.html: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oícheYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ponchtml: Ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: The teacher made the students talk.
result.ga: Chuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caint
result.orig: Chuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caint
result.html: Chuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caintThe teacher made the students talk.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caintThe teacher made the students talk.

result.eng: I can talk to you tomorrow.
result.ga: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárach
result.orig: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárach
result.html: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárachI can talk to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir liom laḃairt leat amáraċI can talk to you tomorrow.

result.eng: He lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ga: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.orig: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.html: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ponchtml: Las sé toitín úr agus ṫosaiġ ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.

result.eng: Do not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.html: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseachtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseaċtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.

result.eng: I can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.orig: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.html: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthachI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom laḃairt leat tá mé róġnóṫaċI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.

result.eng: This is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ga: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.orig: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.html: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ponchtml: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le laḃairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.

result.eng: You should talk to your parents about it.
result.ga: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.html: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobhYou should talk to your parents about it.
result.ponchtml: Ní mór duit dul i gcoṁairle le do ṫuismiṫeoirí ina ṫaoḃYou should talk to your parents about it.

result.eng: He wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ga: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.html: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadhHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sé sásta laḃairt liom a ṫuilleaḋHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.

result.eng: I didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ga: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.orig: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.html: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫuig mé gaċ focal aċ ṫuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.

result.eng: I need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ga: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.html: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradhI need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn uaim laḃairt leat maidir le mo ċonraḋI need to talk to you about my contract.

result.eng: I am here to talk to you.
result.ga: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leat
result.orig: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leat
result.html: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leatI am here to talk to you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé anseo ċun laḃairt leatI am here to talk to you.

result.eng: She is the talk of the town.
result.ga: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.orig: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.html: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.

result.eng: Why did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ga: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.orig: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.html: Cad chuige a raibh tú domhWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige a raiḃ tú doṁWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ga: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.orig: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.html: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ponchtml: Tá ár gcluasa boḋraiṫe aige agus gan as a ḃéal aċ BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ga: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.orig: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.html: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ponchtml: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a ḃeiṫ iontaċ ag mo leiṫéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
